system.notes: Master Crafted Relic Astartes Scout Armour of the Dark Hunters Chapter. Provides all other bonuses of Scout Armour. Awareness Tests to spot the wearer have -20, or -40 if the wearer is standing still. Armour has Built-in Auspex, if wearer makes a Half-Action or more Aim, Auspex allows attacks to treat target's AP as half prior to applying Penetration.
